title: YI shouldn't even be allowed in ranked
body: If he slips through bans, you lose, period. Don't even start with picks and crap

replies.body: lv23 complaining about ranked,  i wonder why..
This is an alt mate :) , Weird I reference ranked if I was lvl 23? How would that work?

Because you dont want us to see your main, obviously.

Yi just got nerfed.

So I'm a lvl 23 complaining about ranked because I don't want you to see my main? You're an idiot switching your view now. "Yea he's lvl 23." "says my point." "You dont want us to see your main." 

Yi being broken and op has nothing to do with my gameplay,
I do not believe he got nerfed, that champion is a monstrosity, and if you looked at any threads recently, there is a new way to climb by mixing Yi and taric and other combinations and not having any worries

> [{quoted}](name=Lacuni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VrE4N8Pa,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-24T04:54:46.078+0000)
>
> So I'm a lvl 23 complaining about ranked because I don't want you to see my main? You're an idiot switching your view now. "Yea he's lvl 23." "says my point." "You dont want us to see your main." 
> 
> Yi being broken and op has nothing to do with my gameplay,
> I do not believe he got nerfed, that champion is a monstrosity, and if you looked at any threads recently, there is a new way to climb by mixing Yi and taric and other combinations and not having any worries

The Yi Taric boosting strategy has existed for a long time. That isnt anything new.

So because the strategy exists for a long time now.. It's ok? All you people do is downvote and put stupid remarks and comments and wonder why the game can never improve and champions that actually need balancing never get balanced 

"Yea the strategies existed for awhile, nothing new."

What a great, moronic response that wasn't even worth typing out and doesn't get to the point

The champion is a monstrosity

> [{quoted}](name=Lacuni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VrE4N8Pa,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-24T04:59:43.026+0000)
>
> So because the strategy exists for a long time now.. It's ok? All you people do is downvote and put stupid remarks and comments and wonder why the game can never improve and champions that actually need balancing never get balanced 
> 
> "Yea the strategies existed for awhile, nothing new."
> 
> What a great, moronic response that wasn't even worth typing out and doesn't get to the point
> 
> The champion is a monstrosity

Take a break from the game. If it's making you this hysterical you need to get away from it.
Congratulations, you're the god of useless comments, please continue. Anyone with half a brain cell could see that you have no view, and are just wasting space on this thread.

> [{quoted}](name=Lacuni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VrE4N8Pa,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-05-24T05:04:17.101+0000)
>
> Congratulations, you're the god of useless comments, please continue. Anyone with half a brain cell could see that you have no view, and are just wasting space on this thread.

You need help
Help from what? Literally, re-read your responses and tell me they weren't idiotic and half-ass

The point is that Yi is worse than ever at higher ELOs, and the game is not balanced around whatever you are from that you dont want us to see.

Plastic VII will never be balanced, players are too bad for that to be possible. Any champion with a gap closer and high sustained damage will always faceroll players with no teamwork, awareness, wards, ect.

man yi has like an 80% pick ban rate and a 65% win rate 

oh wait he dont
